about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the mysterious world of Emerald Dreams: Sanity with this exclusive digital artbook! Moreover, by doing so, you will simultaneously support and motivate our team for the further development of this game.

What you'll get:

An engaging collection of our illustrations and concept art
- Detailed overview of locations: village, forest, and the mysterious cave
- Exclusive sketches of the main character Ruru and other characters
- Concept art of enemies, including Gloomy Stump and skeletons
- Developer comments on the process of creating the world and characters

Features:
- High-quality images in PDF, optimized for viewing on various devices
- Easy navigation through sections: locations, characters, enemies
- Insights about the game's "three layers" and interaction with the "fourth wall"
- Revelation of secrets and easter eggs hidden in the game

Learn more about:

- The evolution of Ruru's design from concept to final look
- The story behind creating the atmosphere of each location
- The philosophy behind enemy design and their role in the game world

Support us as ndependent developers and gain a deeper understanding of the creative process behind Emerald Dreams: Sanity. Every artbook purchase helps us continue to create innovative gaming experiences for you!

Note: This artbook is a digital product and does not include a physical copy.
